Articles.Content:
Well, so this kinda happened.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Was taking a hastily made Arkingthaad style lander out for an atmospheric test. Ended up going exoatmospheric. Then it made orbit. Then it made it out by the moon. Then I (almost!) landed on it. Was at a mere 250 m/s before I was outta fuel.

I could very well have an SSTM Arkingthaad Tower Lander. Soonish.

O_o

... I was expecting it to go boom. I didn't even bother putting on her legs.

Let see how many parts can 1.0 handle before you fry your computer (again)

Also, hope to see more of your creations in the forum, I really like your style.
NASA called, they want their computer back.

WTG Whackjob! I look forward to more of your insanity.

BTW, I've never been able to find this out.... what does "Arkingthaad" mean?

WTG Whackjob! I look forward to more of your insanity.

BTW, I've never been able to find this out.... what does "Arkingthaad" mean?

Doesn't mean anything, really. I suppose when I made the first tower lander, I had somewhere in the back of my mind the Arkingthand dungeon in Skyrim.

Doesn't mean anything, really. I suppose when I made the first tower lander, I had somewhere in the back of my mind the Arkingthand dungeon in Skyrim.

Ah, OK. Yeah, the word does look like it grew up somewhere around the east coast of the North Sea but I'd never made the Skyrim connection. I figured you probably had family roots there and it was some obscure realworld slang word meaning something like "huge, godawful freakshow" .
